ai-mil7.5.1:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, when there was a grandfather’s counselor, which would you think, ‘What is the same definite?’ ”
ai-mil7.5.1:1.2_0: “As in the upper story, having made himself covered with the upper ropes,
ai-mil7.5.1:1.3_0: In the same way, the meditator with his virtue spreading yourselves around on the shadow of a householder, and wandering for alms in any of these six shadows. Yet he is a lay person who has gone on all sides.
ai-mil7.5.1:1.4_0: this is the definition of one offense.
ai-mil7.5.1:2.3_0: For this world’s eyes are untouched,
ai-mil7.5.1:3.1_0: The first enquiry is the first torment,
